last_episode_to_air.name: Part VIII
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ambrose exposes the secret that threw Percy's life off course, setting off widespread consequences.

name: The Sinner
overview: In a small New York town, a haunted detective hunts for answers about perplexing crimes while wrestling with his own demons.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A young mother, overcome by an inexplicable fit of rage, commits a startling act of violence and to her horror has no idea why. An investigator finds himself obsessed with uncovering the woman's buried motive. Together they travel a harrowing journey into the depths of her psyche and the violent secrets hidden in her past.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Detective Harry Ambrose returns to his hometown in rural New York to assess an unsettling and heart wrenching crime: parents murdered by their eleven-year-old son, with no apparent motive. As Ambrose realizes there’s nothing ordinary about the boy or where he came from, the investigation pulls him into the hidden darkness of his hometown.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: When Detective Harry Ambrose begins a routine investigation of a tragic car accident on the outskirts of Dorchester, in upstate New York, he uncovers a hidden crime that pulls him into the most dangerous and disturbing case of his career.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Still reeling from the trauma of a previous case a year ago, the now-retired Harry Ambrose travels to Hanover Island in northern Maine for a recuperative getaway with his partner Sonya, but when an unexpected tragedy occurs involving Percy Muldoon, the daughter of a prominent island family, Ambrose is recruited to help the investigation, only to be thrown into a mystery of mounting paranoia that will turn this sleepy tourist island, and Ambrose’s life, upside down.

tagline: Her sins will drown them all.

episodes.name: Part I
episodes.overview: An unassuming housewife stabs a beachgoer to death, which sparks an investigation and creates confusion in a small town.

episodes.name: Part II
episodes.overview: Cora tries to block Ambrose's continuing investigation, while Mason struggles to come to terms with secrets from Cora's past.

episodes.name: Part III
episodes.overview: Ambrose unearths a startling secret about Cora that changes the course of the investigation; Mason takes matters into his own hands.

episodes.name: Part IV
episodes.overview: With Ambrose's help, Cora struggles to recover missing memories, which lead Ambrose to a new suspect.

episodes.name: Part V
episodes.overview: After a body is discovered in the woods, the investigation into Cora's past deepens.

episodes.name: Part VI
episodes.overview: When Ambrose begins to waver, Cora convinces him to take a risk for the case.

episodes.name: Part VII
episodes.overview: Cora finally remembers the night in question.

episodes.name: Part VIII
episodes.overview: Cora's fate is determined.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A young mother, overcome by an inexplicable fit of rage, commits a startling act of violence and to her horror has no idea why. An investigator finds himself obsessed with uncovering the woman's buried motive. Together they travel a harrowing journey into the depths of her psyche and the violent secrets hidden in her past.

episodes.name: Part I
episodes.overview: A troubled detective returns to his hometown to investigate why a young boy would kill his parents.

episodes.name: Part II
episodes.overview: Ambrose and Heather begin to unravel where Julian is from. Julian is thrust into a new world.

episodes.name: Part III
episodes.overview: Heather makes a startling realization about Marin. Vera and Julian are dealt a hard blow.

episodes.name: Part IV
episodes.overview: Ambrose returns to Mosswood to confront Vera about the commune's work.

episodes.name: Part V
episodes.overview: As Ambrose zeroes in on a new suspect, a rift develops between him and Heather.

episodes.name: Part VI
episodes.overview: Vera reveals Mosswood's past to Ambrose, leading to a turn in Julian's case.

episodes.name: Part VII
episodes.overview: Heather and Ambrose search for Julian.

episodes.name: Part VIII
episodes.overview: Heather and Ambrose continue their search for Julian as Marin’s past is unraveled.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Detective Harry Ambrose returns to his hometown in rural New York to assess an unsettling and heart wrenching crime: parents murdered by their eleven-year-old son, with no apparent motive. As Ambrose realizes there’s nothing ordinary about the boy or where he came from, the investigation pulls him into the hidden darkness of his hometown.

episodes.name: Part I
episodes.overview: Detective Ambrose investigates a tragic yet suspicious car accident on the outskirts of Dorchester.

episodes.name: Part II
episodes.overview: Ambrose looks into Jamie and Nick's relationship before the crash. Jamie begins to unravel.

episodes.name: Part III
episodes.overview: Ambrose investigates Jamie's past. Leela gives birth as Jamie's anxiety reaches a breaking point.

episodes.name: Part IV
episodes.overview: Ambrose pursues Jamie through New York City and tries to prevent another homicide.

episodes.name: Part V
episodes.overview: Ambrose urges the NYPD to investigate Jamie for a new crime. Jamie struggles to salvage his life.

episodes.name: Part VI
episodes.overview: Jamie pays Sonya a surprise visit. Ambrose goes to extreme lengths to get a confession.

episodes.name: Part VII
episodes.overview: After a major turn in the case, Ambrose's tactics are scrutinized.

episodes.name: Part VIII
episodes.overview: Jamie seeks vengeance, putting him on a collision course with Ambrose.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: When Detective Harry Ambrose begins a routine investigation of a tragic car accident on the outskirts of Dorchester, in upstate New York, he uncovers a hidden crime that pulls him into the most dangerous and disturbing case of his career.

episodes.name: Part I
episodes.overview: Ambrose visits the town of Clark Harbor for a getaway and finds himself at the center of a tragedy.

episodes.name: Part II
episodes.overview: A new suspect leads the investigation into an ongoing feud between the Lams and the Muldoons.

episodes.name: Part III
episodes.overview: Ambrose heads to the mainland to learn more about Percy's past and uncovers dark family secrets.

episodes.name: Part IV
episodes.overview: When the Muldoons push to close the investigation, Ambrose refuses, pushing Sonya to the brink.

episodes.name: Part V
episodes.overview: Ambrose discovers the source of Percy's ritualistic practices and dives deeper into her past.

episodes.name: Part VI
episodes.overview: A shocking new crime further rattles the town of Clark Harbor; Ambrose and Meg team together.

episodes.name: Part VII
episodes.overview: Unsure whom to trust, Ambrose hunts down his pursuers.

episodes.name: Part VIII
episodes.overview: Ambrose exposes the secret that threw Percy's life off course, setting off widespread consequences.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Still reeling from the trauma of a previous case a year ago, the now-retired Harry Ambrose travels to Hanover Island in northern Maine for a recuperative getaway with his partner Sonya, but when an unexpected tragedy occurs involving Percy Muldoon, the daughter of a prominent island family, Ambrose is recruited to help the investigation, only to be thrown into a mystery of mounting paranoia that will turn this sleepy tourist island, and Ambrose’s life, upside down.
